statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); if [ -n "$used" ]; then used_int=$(printf "%.0f" "$used"); if [ "$used_int" -lt 20 ]; then color="\033[97m"; elif [ "$used_int" -lt 40 ]; then color="\033[32m"; elif [ "$used_int" -lt 60 ]; then color="\033[38;5;178m"; elif [ "$used_int" -lt 80 ]; then color="\033[38;5;208m"; else color="\033[38;5;160m"; fi; reset="\033[0m"; printf "%s | %s | Context: ${color}%.1f%% used${reset}" "$model" "$cwd" "$used"; else printf "%s | %s" "$model" "$cwd"; fi

hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code needs your attention" with title "Claude Code"'
